title: No qualifications
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics
summary: Percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with no qualifications, Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), 2022 and 2023.
description:
This dataset shows the percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with no qualifications, in Great Britain (Northern Ireland national figure included), for 2022 and 2023.

### Coverage 

GB (England, Wales and Scotland). Northern Ireland national figure included.

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities, 
Counties, 
Combined Authorities, 
Regions, 
Nations (England, Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland), 
Countries (UK, GB, England and Wales)

### Source

 - Great Britain: [Nomis](https://www.nomisweb.co.uk/datasets/apsnew) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
This indicator is based on re-weighted Annual Population Survey datasets updated on 16 August 2022. For more information, see [Impact of reweighting on Labour Force Survey key indicators: 2022](https://www.ons.gov.uk/employmentandlabourmarket/peopleinwork/employmentandemployeetypes/articles/impactofreweightingonlabourforcesurveykeyindicators/2022).

measure.label: Aged 16 to 64 years with no qualifications
